column5: From business and finance to health and medicine, from infrastructure to societal studies, data science plays a vital role in all aspects of the modern world. Our MSc programme will ensure you have an advanced level of skills, knowledge, and experience in this rapidly expanding, highly in-demand field to achieve your career aspirations.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: Full time 12 Months, Part time 24 Months
